Title: Requires the instruction on the importance of Yu Gwan-Sun and her contribution as a globally recognized human rights activist
Summary: Requires the instruction on the importance of Yu Gwan-Sun and her contribution as a globally recognized human rights activist for students in grades 9-12.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a course of study to teach the history of Yu Gwan-Sun and the March 1st movement of Korea
